description: Today we're introducing the super hot, 100% Italian stud Phoenix.By the way, he's only 20...and just turned that young age too! Tommy starts us off by asking all sorts of sex related questions to our new friend. This of course leads Tommy into asking if Phoenix will do bi or gay work...Of course you'll have to watch the video to see what he says.Tommy insists this new hottie show us what he does when he's all alone. Phoenix agrees, and gives us quite the show. From sitting on the couch, to jerking it on his knees, he definitely has some fun.With a hot creamy finale, this scene doesn't disappoint, and may be one of your favorites. Be sure to check out the bonus footage after the credits.Enjoy!
title: Young Italian Fun
